statements: SELECT * FROM landfill_closure_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, responsible_party FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE monitoring_status = TRUE;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE responsible_party = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, monitoring_status FROM landfill_closure_activities ORDER BY activity_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE monitoring_status = TRUE
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM landfill_closure_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT activity_name, responsible_party FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE responsible_party LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE monitoring_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure;
SELECT closure_date, closure_method FROM landfill_closure;
SELECT id, closure_date, closure_method FROM landfill_closure WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM post_closure_activities;
SELECT responsible_party, activity_type FROM post_closure_activities;
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure WHERE monitoring_frequency > 10 ORDER BY closure_date DESC
SELECT id, closure_date, closure_method FROM landfill_closure WHERE closure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, closure_method FROM landfill_closure WHERE closure_method LIKE '%cover%'
SELECT * FROM post_closure_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Monitoring' ORDER BY activity_date ASC
SELECT id, activity_date, responsible_party FROM post_closure_activities WHERE responsible_party LIKE 'Environmental%'
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure WHERE closure_date < current_date() ORDER BY closure_date DESC
SELECT * FROM landfill_closure_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Excavation';
SELECT post_activity_id, post_activity_type, post_activity_date FROM post_closure_activities WHERE post_activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM environmental_monitoring WHERE monitoring_type IN ('Air Quality', 'Water Quality');
SELECT monitoring_results, monitoring_date FROM environmental_monitoring ORDER BY monitoring_date ASC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_date, activity_type, activity_description FROM landfill_closure_activities;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM post_closure_activities ORDER BY post_activity_date DESC;
SELECT monitoring_date, monitoring_results FROM environmental_monitoring WHERE monitoring_type = 'Water Sampling';
SELECT DISTINCT monitoring_type FROM environmental_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, closure_date FROM landfill_sites WHERE closure_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT site_name, post_closure_plan FROM landfill_sites WHERE post_closure_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE site_id = 2;
SELECT site_name, monitoring_date, monitoring_results FROM landfill_sites JOIN monitoring_data ON landfill_sites.site_id = monitoring_data.site_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE closure_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT site_name, closure_date FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM remediation_activities WHERE site_id = 2 ORDER BY remediation_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, monitoring_date, monitoring_results FROM monitoring_data WHERE monitoring_results LIKE '%contaminated%';
SELECT site_name, post_closure_plan FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM landfill_closure_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM LandfillSites;
SELECT site_name, closure_date FROM LandfillSites ORDER BY closure_date DESC;
SELECT plan_status, plan_description FROM RemediationPlans WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT site_name AS SiteName, site_location AS Location FROM LandfillSites WHERE id = 2;
SELECT MAX(parameter_value) AS MaxValue, parameter_name FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData GROUP BY parameter_name;
SELECT * FROM LandfillSites
SELECT site_name, closure_date FROM LandfillSites ORDER BY closure_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MonitoringActivities WHERE activity_type='Groundwater Sampling'
SELECT site_location, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM LandfillSites INNER JOIN MonitoringActivities ON LandfillSites.id = MonitoringActivities.site_id GROUP BY site_location
SELECT site_name, parameter_name, parameter_value, measurement_unit FROM LandfillSites INNER JOIN EnvironmentalMonitoringData ON LandfillSites.id = EnvironmentalMonitoringData.site_id
